summary.para: Contains data used by to identify both an item, in this case through an , and the process that it is associated with.

remarks.para: The instance pointed to by psl must provide the following:

item.description: Either a pointer to an item identifier list (PIDL) () or the target path ( or )

remarks.para: The display name must be set through the item's System.Title (PKEY_Title) property. The property can directly hold the display name or it can be an indirect string representation, such as "@shell32.dll,-1324", to use a stored string. An indirect string enables the item name to be displayed in the user's selected language.
Optionally, the description field () can be set to provide a custom tooltip for the item in the Jump List.

summary.para: Pointer to an instance that, when launched, opens the item. The shortcut is not added by to the user's Recent folder (CSIDL_RECENT, FOLDERID_Recent), but it is added to the Recent category in the specified application's Jump List.
The application-defined AppUserModelID associated with the item.
